Quick Processing

By proceeding with this transaction, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

  • You confirm that the gift card details provided are accurate and belong to you.
  • You understand that incorrect or invalid card details may result in delays or rejection of the trade.
  • Expres Pay reserves the right to validate all submitted cards and may request additional verification if required.
  • All submitted images of the gift card must be clear and free from obstructions to ensure a smooth transaction.
